language.name: English
__Chunk Generation Information Section__: Informational messages about chunk generation go here
chunk.info.pauseForPlayers: Pausing chunk generation for online players.
chunk.info.maxChunkAmountReached: Too many chunks loaded. Required less than {0}, found {1}.
chunk.info.chunkGenerationComplete: Chunk generation complete! Generated {0} chunks for region {2}.
chunk.info.chunkGenerationKickMessage: Cannot be online during chunk generation!
__Generic Information Messages__: All generic informational messages go here
login.message.deny: Cannot join server during chunk generation!
chunk.error.worldLoadFailure: Failed to load world from UUID {0}.
chunk.error.chunkLoadFailure: Failed to load chunk at [X:{0}, Z:{1}].
chunk.error.cancelTaskForRegion: Error occurred! Cancelling chunk generation task for region {0}.
__Command Error Messages: All command error messages go here
command.error.invalidRegionArgs: You must provide the correct arguments for this command!
